entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening and ending before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
